The **Ministry Of Trade and Industry** (Abbreviation: **MTI** ;
[Malay](/wiki/Malay_language "Malay language"): _Kementerian Perdagangan dan
Perusahaan_ ; [Chinese](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese "Simplified Chinese"): 贸工部;
[Tamil](/wiki/Tamil_language "Tamil language"): வர்த்தக, தொழில் அமைச்சு) is a
[ministry](/wiki/Ministry_\(government_department\) "Ministry \(government
department\)") of the [Government of Singapore](/wiki/Government_of_Singapore
"Government of Singapore") that directs the formulation of policies related to
the development of trade and industry in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore
"Singapore").

  * 1 Departments & Statutory boards
  * 2 See also
  * 3 References
  * 4 External links

## Departments & Statutory
boards[[edit](/w/index.php?title=Ministry_of_Trade_and_Industry_\(Singapore\)&action=edit&section=1
"Edit section: Departments & Statutory boards")]

The ministry oversees a department and 9 statutory boards. These are:

  * [Singapore Department of Statistics](/wiki/Singapore_Department_of_Statistics "Singapore Department of Statistics")
  * [Agency for Science, Technology and Research](/wiki/Agency_for_Science,_Technology_and_Research "Agency for Science, Technology and Research") (A*STAR)
  * [Competition and Consumer Commission of Singapore](/wiki/Competition_Commission_of_Singapore "Competition Commission of Singapore") (CCCS)
  * [Economic Development Board](/wiki/Economic_Development_Board "Economic Development Board") (EDB)
  * [Energy Market Authority](/wiki/Energy_Market_Authority "Energy Market Authority") (EMA)
  * [Hotel Licensing Board](/w/index.php?title=Hotel_Licensing_Board&action=edit&redlink=1 "Hotel Licensing Board \(page does not exist\)") (HLB)
  * [JTC Corporation](/wiki/JTC_Corporation "JTC Corporation") (JTC)
  * [Sentosa Development Corporation](/wiki/Sentosa_Development_Corporation "Sentosa Development Corporation") (SDC)
  * [Singapore Tourism Board](/wiki/Singapore_Tourism_Board "Singapore Tourism Board") (STB)
  * [Enterprise Singapore](/wiki/Enterprise_Singapore "Enterprise Singapore")

qa.question: what does the ministry of trade and industry do
qa.answer: ['directs the formulation of policies related to the development of trade and industry in Singapore']

nq_287_20.Query Analysis: The query seeks to understand the functions and responsibilities of the Ministry of Trade and Industry, specifically in the context of Singapore.
nq_287_20.Query Keywords Extraction: Ministry of Trade and Industry, functions, responsibilities, Singapore
